title: Intel i3 6100 vs. AMD FX 6300
description: - This is it: the showdown of the decade! How well does AMD's FX 6300 stack up against Intel's newest take on its 14nm technology? Find out here, where we compare head-to-head - in a series of processing and gaming benchmarks - the AMD FX 6300 and the Intel i3 6100.   FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:   Subscribe to our channel!  Thanks for learning with us!  DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our CJ account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.
